job.description: pSelby Jennings is working with a high level banking institution to find the best technology talent to build their FinTech team They have multiple teams hiring for various roles with fulltime opportunities Read below for the responsibilities and qualifications of the role to see if its a good fit for younbspppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliOwn your system as you write new codeAPIs and have a large impact on different productsliliEntrepreneurial approach to problem solving and solution developmentliliAssist in defining the technical architecture of mission critical systemsliliFind and implement new technology and research to further develop the systems youve createdliulpbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliBachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science or relevant fieldliliAt least 16 years of experience as a professional software engineerliliMastery of Java technologiesliliStrong understanding of modern software architectureliliExperience with fullstack JS React Nodejs and othersliulpbrppstrongOthers to be consideredstrongpulliAWS experienceliliBig data technology experience kafka or hadoopliliPrevious financial experienceliulpbrppMade it this far Take the time to apply and submit your resumep
